item.description:
We're trying to start the planning for practices earlier now!

This will be a terrific opportunity to practice with other dancers, improve your skills, and help others do the same. The practices are for dancers who have at least the basic knowledge of salsa and feel they have something to practice. We'll look forward to seeing you there!

PLEASE NOTE! To help us run practices more efficiently and help you get the most out of them, please state a few ideas of what you'd like to work on in your RSVPs, or email one of the organizers to the left!

The practice will be 1.5 hours! 3:30-5:00pm at the Dance Complex. We'll also be going out to lunch afterward to hang out for a bit. Anyone up for Ana's Taqueria at the MIT Student Center for a couple burritos?

Special Note! Ana will be teaching a special 2 hour intensive Body Movement workshop prior to the practice. This is a great opportunity to take the class and stay after for practicing what was learned during the workshop! Visit www.MasacoteEntertainment.com for more info on the class.

Please feel free to join us for lunch, whether you attend the practice or not. See you soon!

Please bring your dance shoes, your smile, and some ideas of what you would like to work on! Music is always welcome too.

The studio is easily accessible off the red line in Central Square by T. Or, visit www.dancecomplex.org for directions.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: October Salsa Meet-up Practice
